metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17813 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
In Netwide Assembler (NASM) 2.14rc0, there is a use-after-free in thepp_list_one_macro function in asm/preproc.c that will cause a remote denialof service attack, related to mishandling of line-syntax errors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-17813` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

nasm - 2.13.02-0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nasm package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.13.02-0.1').
